title: European Film Academy - Wikipedia
snippet: Mike Downey, an Irish-British film producer, was elected chairman in 2020. In 2021, Polish filmmaker Agnieszka Holland became the first woman to serve as president of the Academy. That same year, the Academy discontinued use of the abbreviation "EFA" and began referring to itself either by ...
